472 

INDEX OF AUTHORS

 granules, 113; deutoplasm, 153; fertiliza- 
 tion in Branchipus, 192; parthenogenesis

 ris, 255; intra-nuclear centrosome, 304.

 jVoctiluca, 92; yolk-nucleus, 157; origin
